name: PLASIM
description: Gerneral Circulation Models Planet Simulator (PlaSim) and PUMA

name: pbidea
description: This is a set of potentially powerful PowerBuilder function extension library, including JSON, XML, httpclient, encryption / decryption, webapi client / server, websocket client / server, FTP / SFTP, PDF view, compress / decompress, image processing, chart, map and other particularly easy-to-use functions

name: pbjson
description: JSON for PowerBuilder classic, a JSON implementation in pure PowerBuilder.
The open source PowerBuilder Foundation Class libraries for Appeon PowerBuilder 2017
